title: Maxxis Shorty Gen 2 MTB mid-spike mud tire gains traction, reduces size & weight
content:
When things get sloppy, mid-spike tires are a way to increase traction without going mud tire. Maxxis recommends their Shorty mid-spike for wet or extreme dust conditions – but most riders will probably reach for their Shorties when mud is in the forecast.
